119745.「塔の中は 不思議なチカラによって\n 外界とは異なるルールで 支配されています:
You cannot bring any items or equipment gold into the tower. You will start all over again from level 1. You will be given the bare
minimum of items and 100 skill points for equipment, which you are expected to use effectively. The weapons you will be given
will depend on your vocation when you move on from the Tower Lobby. You will not be able to bring back items received in the tower.

119746.「魔物を討伐し 塔のエネルギーを\n 解放することができたら\n ボクに 報告を:
Please report to me when you have defeated the monster and liberated the tower's energy, and I will reward you with a feather chip based on
the floor you liberated energy from. If you have not reported to me in a month, you will be rewarded with more money. Feather Chips are
collected by Exchange Shop Cocoroon and Card Enhancer Rabero in the Tower Lobby. By the way, if you leave the tower and interrupt your
adventure, you will not lose your strength or receivedItems in the tower, but you will be able to report your kill and receive your
reward. However, if you report a defeat and receive a reward, your tower suspension status will be reset and you will start over from the
first floor. The only exception to this is that you can keep your Accessory with your equipment.

119747.「ここ 休息の間には\n 冒険をサポートする 施設があるので\n 準備をととのえ:
You can buy items at the General Shop or, if you have money to spare, you can add alchemical effects to your equipment at the
Alchemy Shop. If you use Converter, which converts one piece of equipment into another of similar strength, you should have no
trouble finding the right equipment after changing jobs. If you have any questions, it would be a good idea to ask at each facility.
From there, you will proceed in a party of four. If you have formed a party in advance, you can proceed together with your companions.
If your party is less than 4 people, you can choose whether to join other adventurers or support companions.

119748.「塔の中には さまざまな魔物たちが\n うろついています。経験を積むためにも\n:
There are many different kinds of monsters roaming around in the tower. To gain experience, fight as many monsters as possible
as you advance. When you defeat the monster with the key-like light above its head, the door to the upper floor will open. In the
tower, you can equip any equipment you receive, regardless of your current level, so make use of it as much as you can. You can
also raise or lower your skill points at any time, so it's a good idea to reallocate them according to the situation and equipment you
have. If you want to go out in the middle of an adventure, use the Tower Key. However, please note that if you use it while you are
with other adventurers, it will take a while before you can go on another adventure. After a while, a powerful monster that has sealed
the tower's energy will be waiting for you. Please prepare carefully for this challenge.

119764.「塔の中は 不思議なチカラによって\n 外界とは異なるルールで 支配されています:
You cannot bring any items or equipment gold into the tower. You will start all over again from level 1. You will be given the bare
minimum of items and 100 skill points for equipment, which you are expected to use effectively. The weapons you will be given
will depend on your vocation when you move on from the Tower Lobby. You will not be able to bring back items received in the tower.

119765.「魔物を討伐し 塔のエネルギーを\n 解放することができたら\n ボクに 報告を:
Please report to me when you have defeated the monster and liberated the tower's energy, and I will reward you with a feather chip based on
the floor you liberated energy from. If you have not reported to me in a month, you will be rewarded with more money. Feather Chips are
collected by Exchange Shop Cocoroon and Card Enhancer Rabero in the Tower Lobby. By the way, if you leave the tower and interrupt your
adventure, you will not lose your strength or receivedItems in the tower, but you will be able to report your kill and receive your
reward. However, if you report a defeat and receive a reward, your tower suspension status will be reset and you will start over from the
first floor. The only exception to this is that you can keep your Accessory with your equipment.

119766.「５階ごとにある 休息の間には\n 冒険をサポートする 施設があるので\n 準備:
You can buy items at the General Shop or, if you have money to spare, at the Alchemy Shop to add alchemical effects to your equipment.
If you use Converter, which converts one piece of equipment into another of similar strength, you should have no trouble finding the right
equipment after changing jobs. If you have any questions, it would be a good idea to ask at each facility. From there, you will proceed in
a party of four. If you have formed a party in advance, you can proceed together with your companions. If your party is less than 4
people, you can choose whether to join other adventurers or support companions.

119767.「塔の中には さまざまな魔物たちが\n うろついています。経験を積むためにも\n:
There are many different kinds of monsters roaming around in the tower. To gain experience, fight as many monsters as possible
as you advance. When you defeat the monster with the key-like light above its head, the door to the upper floor will open. In the
tower, you can equip any equipment you receive, regardless of your current level, so make use of it as much as you can. You can
also raise or lower your skill points at any time, so it's a good idea to reallocate them according to the situation and equipment you
have. If you want to go out in the middle of an adventure, use the Tower Key. However, please note that if you use it while you are
with other adventurers, it will take a while before you can go on another adventure. After a while, a powerful monster that has sealed
the tower's energy will be waiting for you. Please prepare carefully for this challenge.

121448.「討伐状況を報告すると 塔の中でのレベルと\n アイテムが リセットされ\n １:
When you report your defeat, your level and items in the tower will be reset and you will restart from the first floor. However, the
Accessory that is being equipped will not be lost and will remain. Is it OK to report the situation as it is?

121449.「他に ご用件は ありますか？\n<break>:
Is there anything else I can help you with?
<break>

121450.「不思議の魔塔の 冒険を中断して\n 塔の入口へ 戻りますか？\n<yesno:
Would you like to interrupt your Mysterious
Tower adventure and return to the tower
entrance?
<yesno 2><break>

121451.「ピピピ まだ 塔の５階以上に\n 到着していないので\n 特に 報告できること:
Pippi, I have nothing specific to report as I
have not yet arrived above the 5th floor of
the tower.
<bw_break>

121452.「ピピピ どうぐかばんが いっぱいで\n 報酬を 受け取れないようです。\n 空:
Pipi Pipi item bag seems to be full and you
cannot receive your reward. Please make room
and report again.
<bw_break>

<%dL_HOUSYU_NUM> pieces!
<se_nots System 7>
<pc> received <%sL_HOUSYU_ITEM2>
<%dL_HOUSYU_NUM2> pieces!
<se_nots System 7>
<end>

121455.「ピピピ また 何かあったら\n 遠慮なく 声をかけてください。\n<end>:
Pippi, please don't hesitate to call on me
again if you need anything else.
<end>

121456.「ピピ こんにちは！\n 何か お役に立てることは\n ありますか？\n<bre:
Pipi Hello! Is there anything I can help you
with?
<break>

121457.「討伐の報告を 受け付けました！\n 今回の 討伐報酬は こちらになります。\n:
We've accepted reports of the defeat! Here are
the rewards for this round.
<end>

tower?

121468.「こちらが 討伐報酬になります。\n その月に まだ報告を受けていない階の討伐は:
Here are the rewards for defeats. We will be
offering richer rewards for the floors that
have not yet been reported for that month.

close your eyes for a moment.

134840.「塔の中は 不思議なチカラによって\n 外界とは異なるルールで 支配されています:
You cannot bring any items or equipment gold into the tower. You will start all over again from level 1. You will be given the bare
minimum of items and 100 skill points for equipment, which you are expected to use effectively. The weapons you will be given
will depend on your vocation when you move on from the Tower Lobby. You will not be able to bring back items received in the tower.

134841.「ここ 休息の間には 魔物たちも\n 入ってこれない はずですが……\n<br>:
The monsters should not be able to enter the rest area, but once we're sure it's safe, we're thinking of putting in a facility to
support your adventures in the tower, so don't worry about that for now. You will finally reach the floor where the monsters are. From
there, you will proceed in a party of four. If you have formed a party in advance, you can proceed together with your companions. If you
have less than four members in your party, you can choose whether to join other adventurers or support companions.

134842.「塔の中には さまざまな魔物たちが\n うろついています。経験を積むためにも\n:
There are many different kinds of monsters roaming around in the tower. To gain experience, fight as many monsters as possible
as you advance. When you defeat the monster with the key-like light above its head, the door to the upper floor will open. In the
tower, you can equip any equipment you receive, regardless of your current level, so make use of it as much as you can. You can
also raise or lower your skill points at any time, so it's a good idea to reallocate them according to the situation and equipment you
have. If you want to go out in the middle of an adventure, use the Tower Key. However, please note that if you use it while you are
with other adventurers, it will take a while before you can go on another adventure. After a while, a powerful monster that has sealed
the tower's energy will be waiting for you. Please prepare carefully for this challenge.

134844.「塔の中は 不思議なチカラによって\n 外界とは異なるルールで 支配されています:
You cannot bring any items or equipment gold into the tower. You will start all over again from level 1. You will be given the bare
minimum of items and 100 skill points for equipment, which you are expected to use effectively. The weapons you will be given
will depend on your vocation when you move on from the Tower Lobby. You will not be able to bring back items received in the tower.

134845.「塔には 休息の間という場所があります。\n ここには 魔物たちも\n 入ってこ:
There is a rest area in the tower. The monsters should not be able to enter this area, but we are planning to put a facility to
support your adventures in the tower once we are sure that it is safe, so don't worry about it now and head for the 5th floor. After
passing through the door at the back of the rest area, you will finally reach the floor where the monsters are. From there, you will
proceed in a party of four. If you have formed a party in advance, you can proceed together with your companions. If you have less than
four members in your party, you can choose whether to join other adventurers or support companions.

134846.「塔の中には さまざまな魔物たちが\n うろついています。経験を積むためにも\n:
There are many different kinds of monsters roaming around in the tower. To gain experience, fight as many monsters as possible
as you advance. When you defeat the monster with the key-like light above its head, the door to the upper floor will open. In the
tower, you can equip any equipment you receive, regardless of your current level, so make use of it as much as you can. You can
also raise or lower your skill points at any time, so it's a good idea to reallocate them according to the situation and equipment you
have. If you want to go out in the middle of an adventure, use the Tower Key. However, please note that if you use it while you are
with other adventurers, it will take a while before you can go on another adventure. After a while, a powerful monster that has sealed
the tower's energy will be waiting for you. Please prepare carefully for this challenge.
